body.chest: Lean, athletic build developed through years of intense ninja training. Chest shows defined musculature (42 inches) without bulk, optimized for speed and agility. Scar from Sasuke's Chidori visible on left pectoral. Skin shows numerous training scars that tell stories of battles won
body.arms: Well-defined arms with wiry strength. Biceps (15 inches) show perfect balance between power and flexibility. Forearms crisscrossed with scars from rasengan training. Hands are calloused but surprisingly dexterous for complex hand signs

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for incredible speed and jumping ability. Thighs (22 inches) show explosive power development. Calves are perfectly toned from tree-walking practice. Can leap between trees and buildings with effortless grace

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector with distinctive scratch across symbol. Orange goggles in early years replaced by headband. Can summon toad sage headdress when entering sage mode. Hair remains unhelmeted for maximum mobility

armor_costume.torso: Signature orange jumpsuit with blue accents, made of durable shinobi fabric. Black shirt underneath for layering. Flame pattern orange jacket as Hokage. Chest protector can be worn over or under depending on mission

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets, allowing free movement for hand signs. Wrist and forearm guards for kunai storage. Fingerless gloves that allow chakra flow while protecting palms

armor_costume.legs: Blue shinobi pants with multiple pockets for tools. Leg warmers for additional protection. Special reinforced sandals that allow chakra adhesion for water and tree walking

armor_costume.accessories: Large scroll for summoning jutsu. Multiple kunai and shuriken holsters. Medical pouch with soldier pills. Rasengan training glove for practice

abilities.name: Rasengan
abilities.short_description: Spiraling sphere of compressed chakra that rotates at cellular level
abilities.full_description: Created by Fourth Hokage, perfected by Naruto. Chakra rotation at 1000+ RPM creates devastating drilling force. Can be thrown (Rasenshuriken), made giant (Mega Rasengan), or combined with elemental nature. Mastery allows one-handed formation. Ultimate form can destroy at molecular level

abilities.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
abilities.short_description: Mass production of physical clones with shared consciousness
abilities.full_description: Forbidden technique mastered due to immense chakra reserves. Can create thousands of clones simultaneously. Each clone has equal power to original. Experiences transfer back when dispersed. Allows for massive multitasking and training acceleration. Tactical applications include reconnaissance, combat overwhelm, and substitution

characters.name: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Co-Founder of Konoha's Reform
Master of the Rinnegan
Bearer of the Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan

head.eyes: Onyx black eyes that become crimson with three tomoe when activated, evolving into the Mangekyo and eventually the Rinnegan with concentric circles in the left eye. Eyes hold intense focus, deep-seated pain, and cool calculation. Dark, heavy eyelashes frame them.
head.nose: Straight, well-defined nose. Keen sense of smell honed for tracking.
head.ears: Unadorned ears, often hidden by his hair. Piercingly sharp hearing, able to detect subtle shifts in battle.
head.extra_facial_features: Pale complexion from the Uchiha lineage. Jet-black hair, spiky and unruly, framing a sharp, handsome face. A permanent slight frown or neutral expression, rarely smiling. The Uchiha clan crest is sometimes worn on his collar.

body.chest: Lean, toned, and athletic build (41 inches), built for speed and precision over brute strength. Carries the scar of his brother's fingertip on his left shoulder. Skin is relatively unmarred due to his evasive fighting style.
body.arms: Sleek, powerful arms (14.5 inches) optimized for swift swordplay and hand signs. Left arm is a white Zetsu-based prosthetic after losing his original. Hands are slender and dexterous, perfect for lightning-release jutsu.

lower_body.legs: Long, powerful legs (23 inches) for high-speed movement and agile footwork. Calves are defined for explosive chakra-enhanced leaps. Wears traditional ninja sandals or boots.

armor_costume.head: Blue Konoha forehead protector with a deep slash through the symbol, later worn on his arm. As an adult, his hair is shorter and he wears a simple black headband.

armor_costume.torso: Signature blue high-collared shirt with the Uchiha fan on the back during Part I. Later, a simple black or grey outfit, often with a cloak. As an adult, a dark travel cloak over a grey outfit.

armor_costume.arms: White arm warmers or bandages in early years. Later, his prosthetic arm is usually covered by a sleeve. Wears a single purple rope bracelet on his right wrist as an adult.

armor_costume.legs: Beige or grey pants, often with bandages around the calves. Simple ninja sandals. As a rogue ninja, added rope ties and a sword scabbard at his hip.

armor_costume.accessories: Kusanagi blade (or other katana) in a back scabbard. Multiple shuriken and kunai pouches. A traveling pack with minimal supplies.

abilities.name: Chidori / Lightning Cutter
abilities.short_description: High-density lightning chakra focused in the palm, producing a sound like a thousand birds.
abilities.full_description: A-rank assassination technique taught by Kakashi. Pierces with extreme speed and precision. Evolved into "Chidori Sharp Spear," "Chidori Stream," and the ultimate "Kirín" which summons and guides natural lightning. The pinnacle is "Lightning Cutter," a more refined and powerful version.

abilities.name: Sharingan & Rinnegan
abilities.short_description: Doujutsu kekkei genkai granting perception, illusion, and unique spacetime powers.
abilities.full_description: Sharingan grants predictive sight, copy ability, and access to genjutsu. Mangekyo unlocks Susano'o, Amaterasu (black flames), and Kagutsuchi (flame control). Eternal Mangekyo prevents blindness. Rinnegan in left eye grants the Six Paths powers, including gravitational control (Amenotejikara), chakra absorption, and planetary devastation.

characters.name: Sakura Haruno
title: Head of Konoha Medical Corps
Master of Strength of a Hundred Seal
Member of Team 7

head.eyes: Large, expressive emerald green eyes that convey intelligence, compassion, and fierce determination. They soften when healing and sharpen in combat.
head.nose: Small and straight. Keen sense for diagnosing illnesses and poisons.
head.ears: Delicate ears, usually visible. Can pick up faint heartbeats and breath sounds for medical diagnosis.
head.extra_facial_features: Pink hair, originally long and worn down, later cut short for practicality as a medic. A wide, bright smile when happy. A small diamond-shaped mark (Strength of a Hundred Seal) on her forehead when released. Fair skin.

body.chest: Slender but deceptively strong build (36 inches). Peak physical condition maintained for chakra control and medical precision. No major scars due to her own healing abilities.
body.arms: Toned arms (12 inches) with incredible explosive power concentrated in the fists. Hands are skilled and steady for surgery, yet can deliver earth-shattering punches.

lower_body.legs: Strong, athletic legs (20 inches) for high mobility in the field. Excellent balance and footwork, crucial for dodging and closing distance.

armor_costume.head: Red Konoha forehead protector worn as a hair band. No helmet, as it would obstruct medical procedures. Short hair for minimal interference.

armor_costume.torso: Classic red qipao dress in early years. Later, a functional maroon top with mesh armor and the Medic symbol on the back. As an adult, a simple black top with a red skirt or pants.

armor_costume.arms: No heavy arm guards, allowing full range for medical jutsu. Wears standard fingerless ninja gloves.

armor_costume.legs: Practical shorts or pants for mobility. Standard ninja sandals. Sometimes wears leg warmers.

armor_costume.accessories: Large medical kit pouch on her back or thigh. Soldier pills. A small knife for field surgery. Emergency scrolls with stored chakra.

abilities.name: Chakra Enhanced Strength
abilities.short_description: Precise chakra control to concentrate immense force into her fists.
abilities.full_description: By gathering chakra at the point of impact and releasing it instantly, Sakura can deliver punches that crater the ground and shatter boulders. The technique requires flawless control to avoid self-injury. Its pinnacle is the "Cherry Blossom Crash," which can destroy Susano'o ribcages.

abilities.name: Creation Rebirth & Strength of a Hundred Seal
abilities.short_description: The ultimate regenerative medical ninjutsu, powered by years of stored chakra.
abilities.full_description: The Strength of a Hundred Seal is a Byakugo mark formed by storing vast amounts of chakra over years. When released, it fuels "Creation Rebirth," which regenerates any injury near-instantly, making her virtually unkillable. It also massively boosts her physical abilities and chakra for other medical techniques.

characters.name: Kakashi Hatake
alias: The Man of a Thousand Techniques
title: Former Leader of Team 7
Master of the Sharingan
Jonin Commander of Konoha

head.eyes: Usually seen as a single dark grey, lazy-looking eye. His left eye is a Sharingan (and later a Mangekyo Sharingan) covered by his headband, glowing red when revealed. His visible eye holds a mix of weariness, sharp intelligence, and hidden warmth.
head.nose: Straight and unremarkable, often buried in his mask or a book.
head.ears: Normal ears, always alert. Known for his exceptional hearing and perception.
head.extra_facial_features: Distinctive silver, spiky hair that sticks up. A black fabric mask covering the lower half of his face, its full appearance a running mystery. A vertical scar runs through his left eye (under the headband). A perpetually relaxed and late demeanor.

body.chest: Lean, well-conditioned athlete's build (40 inches). Not overly bulky, but possesses incredible stamina and resilience from decades of ANBU and frontline duty.
body.arms: Strong, defined arms (14 inches) from years of weapon use and training. Hands are quick and precise for his famed hand-sign speed.

lower_body.legs: Long, powerful legs (22 inches) for high-speed pursuit and agile movement. Famous for his tree-walking and water-walking prowess.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector worn slanted over his left eye to cover the Sharingan. No other headgear.

armor_costume.torso: Standard Konoha Jonin flak jacket over a long-sleeved black shirt. As Hokage, wears the traditional white robe with red flame patterns. Often seen with his signature green vest.

armor_costume.arms: Fingerless gloves. No heavy arm armor, preferring mobility for his copying techniques.

armor_costume.legs: Grey pants. Standard ninja sandals. His posture is always slightly slouched and relaxed.

armor_costume.accessories: A well-worn copy of 'Make-Out Paradise.' A large backpack with various tools. Multiple weapon pouches. A forehead protector memorial band on his left arm.

abilities.name: Sharingan Copy Technique
abilities.short_description: Using the Sharingan to perfectly mimic any non-Kekkei Genkai technique seen.
abilities.full_description: Kakashi's signature skill. His borrowed Sharingan allows him to copy and master over a thousand jutsu, earning his nickname. He combines them with brilliant tactical analysis. While the eye is draining, his genius allows him to use it more efficiently than most Uchiha.

abilities.name: Lightning Cutter & Kamui
abilities.short_description: His original S-rank piercing technique and his Mangekyo's spacetime distortion.
abilities.full_description: Lightning Cutter: A more refined, powerful version of Chidori that cut a lightning bolt. It's his ultimate assassination tool. Kamui: The power of his Mangekyo Sharingan. It can warp targets or parts of targets to a separate dimension. He uses it for defense, offense, and long-range sniping, though it exhausts him greatly.

characters.name: Minato Namikaze
alias: The Savior of the Shinobi World
title: Fourth Hokage
Creator of the Rasengan
Master of Space-Time Ninjutsu

head.eyes: Kind, sharp blue eyes that radiate calm intelligence and warmth. They can turn deadly serious and focused in an instant.
head.nose: Straight and proportionate. A classic, handsome feature.
head.ears: Normal ears, attuned to the slightest sound, crucial for his instantaneous reactions.
head.extra_facial_features: Bright, spiky golden hair. Three markings on each cheek resembling whiskers (inspired by his son's future marks). A gentle, reassuring smile. Wears the standard Hokage hat when in office.

body.chest: A fit, commander's build (41 inches). Not overly muscular, but every ounce is tuned for speed and explosive movement. The physique of a master tactician and sprinter.
body.arms: Well-toned arms (14 inches) with incredible hand-speed for sealing jutsu. His fingers are precise enough for the most complex fuinjutsu.

lower_body.legs: Powerful, runner's legs (23 inches) built for the blinding speed he's famous for. His calves are springs of chakra-enhanced motion.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector worn normally. As Hokage, adds the traditional hat and long white robe with red flame patterns.

armor_costume.torso: As a Jonin, a simple green flak jacket over a black shirt. His Hokage cloak is iconic. Wears a special white short-sleeved jacket during the Nine-Tails attack.

armor_costume.arms: Long, fingerless gloves that extend to his biceps, often marked with seals. No bulky armor to maximize speed.

armor_costume.legs: Standard blue shinobi pants. Special three-strap sandals. Every piece of clothing is streamlined.

armor_costume.accessories: Multiple special kunai marked with his Flying Thunder God formula. A scroll holster for sealing techniques. A standard weapon pouch.

abilities.name: Flying Thunder God Technique
abilities.short_description: Instantaneous teleportation to any location marked with his special seal.
abilities.full_description: S-rank Space-Time Ninjutsu. Minato places his formula seal on kunai, people, or locations. He can then teleport himself or anything else to those seals instantly. This allows him to be in multiple places at once, dodge any attack, and strike from impossible angles, making him the fastest shinobi of his era.

abilities.name: Rasengan
abilities.short_description: A spinning sphere of chakra, created without hand signs.
abilities.full_description: An A-rank technique representing the pinnacle of shape transformation. Minato conceived it, inspired by the Tailed Beast Ball. It's a concentrated vortex of chakra that grinds and blasts away anything it touches. He intended to combine it with nature transformation but never completed it, leaving that to his son.

characters.name: Madara Uchiha
alias: The Great Villain of the Shinobi World
title: Co-Founder of Konohagakure
Awakener of the Rinnegan
Ten-Tails Jinchuriki

head.eyes: Initially black, then crimson Sharingan, evolving to Mangekyo, and finally the majestic, purple Rinnegan. In his reanimated state, he gains a third Rinnegan on his forehead. His gaze is imperious, arrogant, and holds the weight of centuries of ambition.
head.nose: Strong and prominent. A feature of his proud lineage.
head.ears: Unadorned. His hearing is secondary to his unparalleled visual prowess.
head.extra_facial_features: Long, wild black hair that flows like a mane. In youth, it was spiky. Distinctive armor plates on his cheeks. A permanent scowl of disdain or a smirk of absolute confidence. As the Ten-Tails Jinchuriki, his skin turns pale and he gains a horn and Truth-Seeking Balls.

body.chest: A powerful, broad-shouldered warrior's build (46 inches) even in old age. His physique speaks of raw power and endurance that challenged Hashirama Senju. In reanimation, he is restored to his prime.
body.arms: Massive, muscular arms (17 inches) capable of wielding his giant fan and gunbai with one hand. His grip strength is monstrous.

lower_body.legs: Legs like tree trunks (25 inches), granting him stability and power for his colossal Susano'o and leaping attacks.

armor_costume.head: No forehead protector. In his prime, wore a red, armored helmet with his hair flowing out the back. Later, his hair is wild and free. As an Edo Tensei, his hair is tied back.

armor_costume.torso: Signature red samurai-style armor with multiple plates and a blue cord. Wears a long, black cloak. As the Ten-Tails Jinchuriki, his armor integrates with the beast's form and he gains the Sage's Six Paths Tomoe robe.

armor_costume.arms: Armored gauntlets and sleeves as part of his red armor. His arms are always protected for close combat.

armor_costume.legs: Matching red armored leggings and sandals. His lower body is fully armored for frontline warfare.

armor_costume.accessories: His giant Uchiha fan (Gunbai) which can reflect attacks. A kusarigama (chain-sickle) weapon. A connected chain to his fan. In later stages, carries the Sage's staff and Truth-Seeking Balls.

abilities.name: Perfect Susano'o
abilities.short_description: The ultimate manifestation of Uchiha power, a colossal warrior of chakra.
abilities.full_description: The pinnacle of Mangekyo Sharingan power. Madara's Susano'o is a mountainous, armored samurai wielding twin swords that can cut entire mountain ranges with a single swing. It flies and provides near-absolute defense. It represents his indomitable will and supreme power among the Uchiha.

abilities.name: Rinnegan & Limbo: Border Jail
abilities.short_description: The eyes of the Sage, granting god-like powers and invisible clones.
abilities.full_description: Awakened near the end of his life, the Rinnegan grants him all Six Paths abilities (gravity control, soul ripping, chakra absorption, etc.). His unique Rinnegan power is "Limbo," which creates invisible, intangible clones in a parallel world that can interact with the real one. Only those with Six Paths Senjutsu or a Rinnegan can perceive them.

head.eyes: Warm, dark brown eyes that usually hold a friendly, slightly naive glint, but can become fiercely determined. In Sage Mode, his eyes turn yellow with horizontal pupils.
head.nose: Strong and straight. A feature of his robust health and vitality.
head.ears: Normal ears. His hearing is good, but his sensory skills come from his sage abilities and connection to nature.
head.extra_facial_features: Long, dark brown hair worn loose to his mid-back. A kind, open face with a wide, goofy smile. Distinctive red markings on his face that extend in Sage Mode. Tanned skin from an outdoor life. Wears the Hokage hat when formal.

body.chest: An incredibly powerful, broad, and muscular build (48 inches). His body is a testament to his immense life force and physical strength, capable of wrestling tailed beasts.
body.arms: Massive, tree-trunk-like arms (18 inches) that can perform the mightiest of seals and punches. His grip is legendary.

lower_body.legs: Immensely strong legs (26 inches) that provide a stable foundation for his colossal wood constructs. He is grounded and immovable like an ancient tree.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector worn under his Hokage hat. In battle, his hair flows freely. His Sage Mode markings appear on his face.

armor_costume.torso: Traditional samurai armor in red and black, often with a white fur collar. As Hokage, wears the standard white robe with red flame patterns. Prefers lightweight, traditional garments.

armor_costume.arms: Armored sleeves and gauntlets as part of his samurai set. His arms are protected but allow for the complex hand signs of Wood Release.

armor_costume.legs: Matching armored leggings and traditional Japanese sandals. His lower body is armored for the thick of battle.

armor_costume.accessories: A large scroll for summoning. His Hokage necklace. He rarely carries many tools, as his body is his greatest weapon.

abilities.name: Wood Release
abilities.short_description: Kekkei Genkai combining earth and water to create wood and plants, controlling life itself.
abilities.full_description: A unique power stemming from his Asura lineage and immense life force. He can generate vast forests instantly, create giant wooden golems, and even construct buildings. His wood can suppress tailed beast chakra. Signature techniques include "Deep Forest Emergence," "Wood Dragon," and "Wood Golem." It represents his will for creation and peace.

abilities.name: Sage Mode & Self-Regeneration
abilities.short_description: A perfect, instant Sage Mode and a healing factor that borders on immortality.
abilities.full_description: Hashirama's Sage Mode is considered perfect and can be entered instantly. It massively boosts all his stats and sensory abilities. Combined with his innate "Self-Regeneration" ability, he can heal any wound near-instantly without forming hand signs, making him nearly impossible to kill in battle. This is a product of his unparalleled life force.

characters.name: Jiraiya
alias: The Teacher of the Child of Prophecy
title: Member of the Legendary Sannin
Author of the 'Make-Out' Series
Master of Toad Summoning

head.eyes: Sharp, narrow eyes that are usually crinkled in a lecherous grin but can become intensely serious and wise. In Sage Mode, they turn yellow with horizontal toad-like pupils and red markings around them.
head.nose: Large and distinctive. Often wrinkled when he laughs or gets excited.
head.ears: Large ears that can hear gossip from a mile away. Attuned to the natural energy of Mount Myoboku.
head.extra_facial_features: Long, spiky white hair worn in a ponytail. Two red lines running down from his eyes. A large wart on the left side of his nose. A wide, infectious, and often perverted smile. Bushy white eyebrows.

body.chest: A tall, broad, and powerfully built frame (46 inches). He is heavily muscular but carries it with a lumbering, relaxed gait. Has the physique of a seasoned warrior who enjoys life.
body.arms: Thick, powerful arms (16 inches) capable of powerful rasengan strikes and complex sealing jutsu. His hands are large and strong.

lower_body.legs: Strong, pillar-like legs (24 inches) that allow for great jumping power, enhanced by toad-style taijutsu.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector with a red scarf wrapped around it, forming a sun-like design. His long white hair is tied back. In Sage Mode, his hair spikes up and he gains toad features.

armor_costume.torso: His signature red vest with no shirt underneath, showing his chest. Wears a short kimono jacket. As a traveler, he wears a large brown cloak. His chest is often exposed.

armor_costume.arms: No arm guards. He wears blue wristbands and simple hand wrappings.

armor_costume.legs: Loose, dark blue pants. Traditional wooden geta sandals. His clothing is loose and comfortable for travel and battle.

armor_costume.accessories: A large scroll for summoning toads. A smaller scroll for his 'research' (Make-Out Paradise). A flask of sake. A tobacco pipe. Various ink and writing tools.

abilities.name: Sage Mode & Toad Summoning
abilities.short_description: Harnessing natural energy with the toads of Mount Myoboku, and summoning them to aid in battle.
abilities.full_description: Jiraiya summons and fights alongside giant toads like Gamabunta. His Sage Mode is imperfect (needs the two elder toads on his shoulders to gather nature energy), but grants a massive boost in strength, durability, and new techniques like "Toad Sage: Toad Oil Flame Bullet." His bond with the toads is his greatest strength.

abilities.name: Rasengan & Diverse Jutsu Arsenal
abilities.short_description: Master of the Rasengan and a vast array of ninjutsu, from fire to sealing techniques.
abilities.full_description: Jiraiya is a master of the Rasengan, which he taught to Minato and later Naruto. His true power lies in his incredible versatility: powerful Fire Release techniques, Earth Release for defense, hair-based needle attacks, and complex barrier and sealing ninjutsu (like the Five-Pronged Seal). He is a true all-rounder and tactical genius.

head.eyes: Beautiful, warm amber-brown eyes that can shift from gentle and caring to fierce and commanding in an instant. They hold the wisdom of decades and a hint of old sorrow.
head.nose: Straight and elegant. Keen for diagnosing ailments.
head.ears: Delicate ears, usually adorned with simple green gemstone earrings. Her hearing is sharp for a medic's needs.
head.extra_facial_features: Blonde hair tied into twin ponytails. A youthful appearance maintained by precise chakra control, belying her true age. A small diamond-shaped mark (Strength of a Hundred Seal) on her forehead. Full lips often set in a determined line. The Byakugo seal is released as a violet diamond pattern across her face and body.

body.chest: A voluptuous and powerful figure (44 inches). Her body is a paradox of incredible strength and delicate medical precision. She maintains peak physical condition.
body.arms: Deceptively slender arms (13 inches) that contain monstrous power. Her hands are the most skilled surgical tools in the world, yet can shatter the ground.

lower_body.legs: Strong, shapely legs (21 inches) for stability in combat and during long surgeries. Her balance is perfect.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector worn as a necklace with a large green gem. When acting as Hokage, she wears the traditional hat. Her hair is always practical.

armor_costume.torso: Signature green short jacket with the kanji for "gamble" on the back. Often wears a brown kimono-style shirt underneath. As Hokage, wears the white robe over her usual clothes.

armor_costume.arms: No arm guards. She needs her arms completely free for medical jutsu and her powerful strikes.

armor_costume.legs: Simple brown or black shorts or a short skirt for maximum mobility. High-heeled sandals (a personal preference, balanced by her chakra control).

armor_costume.accessories: A large, green gemstone pendant on her forehead protector. A dark red vest. Her legendary gambling dice. A large medical supply scroll.

abilities.name: Creation Rebirth & Strength of a Hundred Seal
abilities.short_description: The pinnacle of medical ninjutsu, granting instant regeneration.
abilities.full_description: As the creator of this technique, Tsunade's mastery is absolute. The Byakugo Seal stores years of chakra. When released, it fuels "Creation Rebirth," which continuously regenerates all damage, making her effectively immortal in battle. It also provides a massive chakra boost for other techniques. It is the ultimate expression of a medic's will to protect.

abilities.name: Monstrous Strength
abilities.short_description: Precise chakra control that releases explosive force on contact.
abilities.full_description: While not inherently strong, Tsunade uses flawless chakra control to gather chakra at the point of impact (fist, finger, foot) and release it in a devastating explosion. This allows her to crater the ground, destroy Susano'o ribcages, and harm even Madara Uchiha. A single touch can be fatal.

characters.name: Orochimaru
title: Founder of the Hidden Sound Village
Master of Forbidden Jutsu
Father of Mitsuki

head.eyes: Piercing, golden snake-like eyes with vertical slits for pupils. They hold a cold, analytical, and deeply curious gaze, devoid of conventional morality. Can induce paralyzing fear.
head.nose: Sharp and narrow. His sense of smell is keen, like a snake's.
head.ears: Pointed, almost elven ears. He hears everything, especially secrets and weaknesses.
head.extra_facial_features: Pale, almost sickly lavender-tinged skin. Long, straight black hair that frames his narrow face. Purple markings around his eyes that extend down his cheeks. A long, often-forked tongue that darts out. A chilling, unsettling smile that doesn't reach his eyes.

body.chest: A slender, almost androgynous build (39 inches). His body is not built for raw power but for flexibility, regeneration, and hosting countless forbidden techniques. It is more a vessel than a fixed form.
body.arms: Long, slender arms (15 inches) that can stretch and contort impossibly. His hands are pale and nimble, perfect for experiments and snake-like strikes.

lower_body.legs: Similarly long and slender legs (22 inches). He moves with a silent, slithering grace rather than explosive speed.

armor_costume.head: A simple blue rope headband from the Hidden Sound, or later, no headband at all. His long hair is his main feature. Sometimes wears a white hooded cloak.

armor_costume.torso: Favors simple, loose-fitting purple or white robes, often with a thick purple rope belt. His clothing is designed for ease of movement and concealment of his snake-like abilities.

armor_costume.arms: No arm guards. He often has bandages on his wrists or arms, hiding his Living Corpse Reincarnation seals or other modifications.

armor_costume.legs: Loose-fitting pants. Simple sandals. His attire is minimalist and functional for a lab or battlefield.

armor_costume.accessories: His legendary Kusanagi sword, which he can summon from his mouth. Various scrolls and vials of chemicals and specimens. A laboratory coat when experimenting.

abilities.name: Living Corpse Reincarnation
abilities.short_description: A forbidden immortality technique that transfers his consciousness to a new host body.
abilities.full_description: The core of Orochimaru's quest for immortality. He prepares a host, then sheds his old body like a snake's skin, transferring his soul and all knowledge into the new one. This grants him eternal life and the ability to learn all jutsu. The process weakens him for three years after each use.

abilities.name: Mastery of Forbidden Jutsu & Snake Arts
abilities.short_description: An unparalleled knowledge of cursed techniques, snake summoning, and body modification.
abilities.full_description: Orochimaru's power is his vast knowledge. He can summon giant snakes, stretch his body like rubber, vomit swords, and regenerate from most injuries. He has mastered countless kinjutsu, including the Edo Tensei (Impure World Reincarnation), which he perfected. His fighting style is unpredictable, creepy, and exploits every weakness.

head.eyes: Sharp, obsidian-black eyes that become a crimson Sharingan with three tomoe, evolving into the intricate pinwheel pattern of his Mangekyo. His gaze is perpetually calm, profound, and filled with hidden sorrow and love.
head.nose: Straight and defined. A noble feature.
head.ears: Normal ears, often hidden by his long hair. He hears the truth behind words.
head.extra_facial_features: Pale, flawless complexion. Long, straight black hair tied in a low ponytail. Pronounced tear troughs under his eyes, accentuated by his Mangekyo's strain. A handsome, stoic face that rarely shows emotion. Two vertical lines running down from the inner corners of his eyes.

body.chest: A slender, almost delicate build (40 inches) that belies his immense power and speed. He relies on precision and genius, not brute strength.
body.arms: Long, slender arms (14 inches) with lightning-fast hand signs. His fingers are dexterous, used for subtle genjutsu casting and swift weapon throws.

lower_body.legs: Lean, agile legs (21 inches) for graceful, efficient movement. He is a master of evasion and positioning.

armor_costume.head: A Konoha forehead protector with a deep scratch through the symbol, worn on his forehead as an ANBU, then on his hip as a rogue ninja. As Akatsuki, he wears the cloud-patterned cloak.

armor_costume.torso: As Akatsuki, the black cloak with red clouds over a simple black outfit. As an ANBU, the standard grey armor and gear. In his youth, a simple Uchiha high-collared shirt.

armor_costume.arms: No heavy arm guards. Wears the Akatsuki ring 'Kite' (朱, crimson) on his right ring finger. His hands are often in his pockets or performing subtle signs.

armor_costume.legs: Simple black pants. Standard ninja sandals. His attire is always neat and uncluttered.

armor_costume.accessories: A small weapon pouch for kunai and shuriken. As Akatsuki, wears a woven straw hat. Carries the Sword of Totsuka and the Yata Mirror within his Susano'o.

abilities.name: Tsukuyomi
abilities.short_description: An ultimate genjutsu that tortures the victim's mind in a world where Itachi controls time and space.
abilities.full_description: Cast through eye contact, Tsukuyomi places the victim in a illusory world completely under Itachi's control. He can make days of torture pass in an instant in the real world. Only those with a Mangekyo Sharingan or special bloodline (like a Jinchuriki) have a chance to resist. It represents his mastery over illusion and the mind.

abilities.name: Susano'o & Spiritual Weapons
abilities.short_description: A giant, ethereal warrior that wields god-like, sealed weapons.
abilities.full_description: Itachi's Susano'o is a orange-hued, armored samurai. It is unique for wielding two legendary items: the "Sword of Totsuka," a ethereal blade that seals anything it pierces into a genjutsu world of eternal drunkenness, and the "Yata Mirror," a shield that changes its nature to nullify any attack. This makes his Susano'o virtually invincible and captures rather than kills.

characters.name: Obito Uchiha
alias: The One Who Started the Fourth War
title: Ten-Tails Jinchuriki
Master of Kamui
Leader of the Akatsuki (as Tobi)

head.eyes: As a child, kind black eyes. After trauma, one eye is his original Sharingan/Mangekyo, the other is a Rinnegan (given by Madara). His right side of his face is severely scarred and covered by white Zetsu material. His visible eye cycles through goofy (as Tobi), menacing, and finally regretful.
head.nose: His original nose is intact on the left side. The right side is scarred/masked.
head.ears: One normal ear. His hearing is fine.
head.extra_facial_features: Spiky black hair. The right half of his face is a mass of scars and is fused with white Zetsu cells, giving it a rough, bumpy texture. He initially hides this with a orange spiral mask, later a simpler one. As an adult, his face is grim and weathered.

body.chest: A tall, powerful build (44 inches) in adulthood. His right side is reinforced with Hashirama's cells, granting him enhanced strength and vitality.
body.arms: His right arm is also composed of Zetsu material, giving it regenerative properties. His left arm is normal but strong. He is ambidextrous in combat.

lower_body.legs: Strong legs (23 inches). His right leg is also partially Zetsu-enhanced. He moves with solid, determined strides.

armor_costume.head: His iconic masks: first an orange, spiral-patterned mask with one eye hole, later a plain white one. As the Ten-Tails Jinchuriki, he has long, wild white hair and a horn.

armor_costume.torso: As Tobi, wears the Akatsuki cloak over a black outfit. Earlier, wore a grey flak jacket. During the war, wore a simple black jumpsuit. His right side is often bandaged or covered.

armor_costume.arms: Wears a single black glove on his left hand. His right Zetsu arm is usually uncovered or wrapped. No heavy armor, relying on Kamui for defense.

armor_costume.legs: Black pants. Standard ninja sandals. His attire is practical for his intangible fighting style.

armor_costume.accessories: A large, connected chain with a sickle. A giant shuriken. As Ten-Tails Jinchuriki, gains the Truth-Seeking Balls and the Sage's staff.

abilities.name: Kamui
abilities.short_description: A Mangekyo Sharingan ability that grants intangibility and long-range teleportation to a pocket dimension.
abilities.full_description: Obito's left eye allows him to become intangible by sending parts of himself to the Kamui dimension, making attacks pass through him. He can also teleport himself or others entirely. His right eye (given to Kakashi) allows long-range targeting and teleportation of distant objects. Together, they make him nearly untouchable and a master of surprise attacks.

abilities.name: Ten-Tails Jinchuriki & Six Paths Power
abilities.short_description: Becoming the host of the Ten-Tails grants him god-like abilities akin to the Sage of Six Paths.
abilities.full_description: As the Jinchuriki of the Ten-Tails, Obito gains near-limitless chakra, flight, Truth-Seeking Balls that nullify all ninjutsu, and the ability to use all five basic nature transformations plus Yin-Yang Release. He can also use the "Six Paths Ten-Tails Coffin Seal" to become the beast's core. In this state, he is one of the most powerful beings in history.

characters.name: Rock Lee
alias: The Beautiful Green Beast of Konoha
title: Master of Taijutsu
Konoha's Splendid Ninja
Member of Team Guy

head.eyes: Large, round, and perpetually determined black eyes. They shine with unwavering spirit and enthusiasm. They become fierce slits when he opens the Inner Gates.
head.nose: Small and rounded. Often scrunched up when he's yelling or crying with passion.
head.ears: Normal ears. He listens intently to his sensei's teachings.
head.extra_facial_features: His most iconic feature: extremely thick, shiny black eyebrows. A bowl-cut hairstyle. A wide, toothy smile that is almost always present. Tanned skin from endless training. Wears a green jumpsuit headband on his forehead.

body.chest: A compact, incredibly dense and muscular build (38 inches). Every muscle is honed for speed, power, and endurance through inhuman training. His body is a weapon.
body.arms: Powerful, well-defined arms (13 inches) wrapped in bandages. His fists are calloused and capable of breaking stone.

lower_body.legs: His most powerful asset. Legendarily strong legs (21 inches) from thousands of laps and leg weights. His kicks are devastating. He always wears heavy training weights on his calves.

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector worn as a bandana. His iconic bowl-cut and eyebrows are always visible. No helmet.

armor_costume.torso: His signature bright green full-body jumpsuit, often with orange leg warmers. Sometimes wears a matching green vest. The jumpsuit is durable and allows maximum flexibility.
armor_costume.arms: White bandages wrapped around his hands and forearms for protection and to improve grip. No gauntlets.

armor_costume.legs: The green jumpsuit continues. Orange leg warmers. His most important feature: the heavy metal training weights he removes for battle, which crater the ground when dropped.

armor_costume.accessories: His removable leg weights. A small first-aid kit. A photo of Guy-sensei for inspiration. A flask of water.

abilities.name: The Eight Inner Gates
abilities.short_description: Releasing the body's natural limiters to access explosive, life-threatening power.
abilities.full_description: By opening chakra gates within the body, Lee can massively increase his speed and strength far beyond normal human limits. Each gate opened multiplies his power but damages his body. The ultimate gate, the Gate of Death, grants power rivaling a Kage but at the cost of the user's life. Lee can safely open up to the Fifth Gate.

abilities.name: Supreme Taijutsu Mastery
abilities.short_description: A pure, weapons-free fighting style developed to overcome his lack of ninjutsu.
abilities.full_description: Lee is a master of strong, direct taijutsu. His style, taught by Might Guy, includes techniques like "Leaf Hurricane" (spinning kick), "Front Lotus" (a powerful grab and slam), and "Reverse Lotus" (using the Gates). His speed, agility, and power make him a formidable opponent even against genjutsu and ninjutsu specialists.

head.eyes: Large, gentle lavender eyes that are usually shy and downcast, but can become fiercely determined. When activated, her Byakugan makes the pupils vanish and veins bulge around her eyes, granting 359-degree vision.
head.nose: Small and delicate. Blushes easily.
head.ears: Small ears, often hidden by her hair. She is a good listener but often too shy to speak.
head.extra_facial_features: Dark blue hair cut in a short, neat style with a fringe. A pale, delicate complexion that flushes bright red easily, especially around Naruto. A kind, soft smile. She has the classic Hyuga pupil-less eyes when using her kekkei genkai.

body.chest: A slender, graceful build (34 inches). Her physique is optimized for the precise, close-quarters Gentle Fist style, requiring flexibility and fine control over chakra points.
body.arms: Slender arms (11 inches) that strike with pinpoint accuracy. Her hands are delicate but can shut down an opponent's chakra system with a touch.

lower_body.legs: Graceful, agile legs (19 inches) for the fluid footwork of the Hyuga's Eight Trigrams style. She moves with quiet elegance.

armor_costume.head: No standard forehead protector. As a Hyuga, she has the branch family's Cursed Seal symbol on her forehead in Part I, but it is removed later. Her hair is simple and practical.

armor_costume.torso: In Part I, a traditional lavender-colored Hyuga kimono-style top. Later, she adopts a more practical dark purple jacket with zip-up and mesh armor. As an adult, she wears simple, elegant civilian clothing or a modified combat jacket.

armor_costume.arms: No arm guards. She needs her arms completely free for the precise strikes of Gentle Fist.

armor_costume.legs: Matching purple pants or a long skirt. Standard ninja sandals. Her clothing allows for full range of motion.

armor_costume.accessories: A small medical pouch. A kunai holster. A photo of Naruto for courage (in her youth).

abilities.name: Byakugan & Gentle Fist
abilities.short_description: The Hyuga clan's doujutsu that sees chakra and a martial art that attacks the body's chakra network.
abilities.full_description: The Byakugan grants near-360-degree vision, the ability to see through objects, and detailed chakra perception. Hinata uses this with the "Gentle Fist" style, striking an opponent's chakra points (tenketsu) to block their chakra flow, damage internal organs, and paralyze limbs. Her signature technique is "Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms."

abilities.name: Twin Lion Fists
abilities.short_description: An advanced Gentle Fist technique that forms chakra into lion heads around the fists.
abilities.full_description: A technique that signifies Hinata's growth and resolve. She shapes her chakra into the form of two roaring lion heads around her hands. These lions amplify her Gentle Fist strikes, allowing her to attack from a slightly longer range and drain the opponent's chakra on contact. It represents her finding her own fierce strength within her gentle nature.

head.eyes: Gleaming, intelligent crimson eyes with slit pupils, capable of expressing a vast range of emotions from pure malice to grudging respect to fondness. They glow with immense power.
head.nose: A fox-like snout with a black nose, capable of sniffing out malice and negative emotions.
head.ears: Large, pointed vulpine ears that are always perked and alert. They can hear the whispers of chakra and distant conversations.
head.extra_facial_features: The face of a giant fox, with sharp fangs and black markings around the eyes that look like war paint. His expression evolved from a permanent snarl to a more dignified, knowing look. His entire form is composed of swirling, fiery orange chakra.

body.chest: A colossal, quadrupedal body made of pure chakra. In his full form, he is a mountain-sized fox with nine powerful tails. His chakra is so dense it feels physical. His chest houses his core consciousness.
body.arms: As a quadruped, his front legs are massive pillars of power, ending in sharp claws that can rend the earth. When standing bipedally in cooperation with Naruto, he has defined, muscular arms.

lower_body.legs: His hind legs are even more powerful, allowing for leaps that cover miles. His nine tails are his most distinctive feature, each capable of independent movement and storing vast amounts of chakra.

armor_costume.head: No armor. His body is his armor. In his cooperative form with Naruto, he appears as a chakra cloak with a fox-like hood and face.

armor_costume.torso: His form is pure chakra. When Naruto uses his power, it manifests as a chakra shroud, a tailed beast mode, or a perfect Jinchuriki form where they merge completely.

armor_costume.arms: See above. His claws are his weapons.

armor_costume.legs: See above.

armor_costume.accessories: As a tailed beast, he has no accessories. His power is accessed through the Jinchuriki's seal and cooperation.

abilities.name: Tailed Beast Ball
abilities.short_description: A sphere of condensed positive and negative chakra that causes a massive explosion.
abilities.full_description: The signature attack of all tailed beasts. Kurama gathers an immense amount of chakra, mixing positive (black) and negative (white) chakra in an 8:2 ratio to form a dark sphere. He then fires it as a beam or projectile. At full power, it can vaporize mountains and create craters miles wide. It is the pinnacle of raw destructive power.

abilities.name: Immense Chakra Reservoir & Negative Emotion Sensing
abilities.short_description: Possesses the largest chakra pool of the nine bijuu and can sense malice and hatred.
abilities.full_description: Kurama's chakra is vast enough to supply an entire army. It grants his Jinchuriki near-limitless stamina, enhanced healing, and a massive power boost. He can also sense negative emotions and malice, a trait born from humanity's hatred towards him. After reconciling with Naruto, this chakra becomes a pure, warm power that can be shared with others and even heal them.

head.eyes: Dark, determined eyes that shine with unbreakable will. Eyes become more intense when using Conqueror's Haki, seeming to pierce through opponents' souls. Always sparkling with adventure and curiosity about the world
head.nose: Normal human nose that's surprisingly good at smelling meat from great distances. Can detect specific ingredients in dishes. Slightly rounded tip that gives boyish appearance
head.ears: Normal ears that listen intently to friends' dreams and enemies' weaknesses. Can hear the 'voice of all things' including ancient poneglyphs. Usually hidden under straw hat
head.extra_facial_features: Prominent scar under left eye from self-inflicted childhood demonstration of courage. Wide, rubbery grin that stretches impossibly wide when laughing. Black hair that's short and messy. Cheeks retain youthful roundness despite harsh experiences. Straw hat constantly present except in most intense battles

body.chest: Lean, rubbery torso that can stretch and compress amazingly. Chest bears large X-shaped scar from Akainu's magma fist. Muscles are deceptively strong despite slim appearance (38-inch chest). Skin has rubber texture that bounces back from impacts. Can inflate like balloon using Gear 3 techniques
body.arms: Long, stretchable arms that can extend for miles. Biceps can expand to gigantic proportions. Shoulders are incredibly flexible. Hands are usually clenched in fists ready for Gum-Gum Pistol attacks. Wrists bear friendship tattoos from Impel Down

lower_body.legs: Rubbery legs that can stretch like elastic. Thighs can expand for Gear 3 attacks. Calves are strong enough to kick through steel. Feet are usually barefoot or in simple sandals. Can spin legs like propellers for unique movement techniques

armor_costume.head: Straw hat given by Shanks, his most precious treasure. Hat is surprisingly durable, surviving countless battles. Symbol of promise to become Pirate King. Worn always except in most serious fights

armor_costume.torso: Red vest worn open over bare chest. Sometimes adds longer red coat when in colder climates or formal situations. No armor as rubber body provides natural defense. Scar proudly displayed as badge of survival

armor_costume.arms: No arm protection. Wrist tattoos from Impel Down alliance. Arms free for maximum stretching capability. Sometimes wears armbands in different arcs

armor_costume.legs: Blue shorts or pants depending on arc. No leg armor. Simple sandals or going barefoot. Clothing designed not to restrict rubber body movements

armor_costume.accessories: Yellow sash tied around waist. Sometimes adds backpack for food storage. No weapons as his body is his weapon. Den Den Mushi for communication when needed

abilities.name: Gum-Gum Fruit Powers
abilities.short_description: Rubber body with incredible stretching, bouncing, and impact resistance
abilities.full_description: Body has properties of rubber: immune to blunt attacks, electricity, and bullets. Can stretch any body part up to 72 times original length. Elasticity allows for incredible speed when snapping back. Impact resistance scales with willpower. Can inflate bones and muscles for power boosts. Awakening allows environment to become rubber

abilities.name: Haki Mastery
abilities.short_description: Three types of spiritual energy: Observation, Armament, and Conqueror's
abilities.full_description: Observation Haki: Sense presence, emotions, and predict movements. Advanced form sees several seconds into future. Armament Haki: Hardens body like iron, can hit logia users. Advanced form emits internal destruction. Conqueror's Haki: Knocks out weak-willed, can coat attacks for supreme power. Only one in millions has this ability

head.eyes: Warm, compassionate maroon eyes that shift to sharp focus during combat. Eyes contain the kindness of his family and determination of his mission. Pupils can become slitted when tapping into demonic memories or intense concentration
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose that can detect emotions, demons, and minute environmental changes. Can smell sadness, lies, and even history of locations. Slightly rounded tip that gives gentle appearance
head.ears: Normal ears adorned with distinctive hanafuda earrings passed through generations. Can hear heartbeats and subtle movements. Earrings jingle softly during movement, becoming a recognizable sound to allies
head.extra_facial_features: Gentle face with kind features that belie his warrior spirit. Prominent scar on forehead that changes form when using Sun Breathing techniques. Black hair with red tips that glow during intense battles. Hair usually tied in ponytail. Expression usually kind but becomes fiercely protective when fighting demons

body.chest: Lean, athletic build developed through brutal training. Chest (40 inches) shows definition without bulk, optimized for breathing techniques. Scar from initial demon attack visible on shoulder. Skin bears numerous training scars from Urokodaki's harsh methods. Breathing causes visible steam during techniques
body.arms: Strong arms with defined muscles from constant sword practice. Biceps (14 inches) show perfect sword-swinging development. Forearms are crisscrossed with scars from battles. Hands are calloused but gentle when caring for Nezuko. Grip strength exceptional for sword control

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for the Total Concentration Constant. Thighs (21 inches) show explosive power for Water Breathing techniques. Calves are perfectly toned from mountain running. Can maintain incredible speed and agility for extended periods

armor_costume.head: No helmet, allowing maximum sensory perception. Checkered haori hood can be pulled up in rain or snow. Hanafuda earrings constantly worn. Hair tied back to keep vision clear

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer Corps uniform: black gakuran jacket with bronze buttons. Green and black checkered haori over top, pattern matching his sister's kimono. Uniform reinforced with special fibers that resist demon claws

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets, allowing free movement for sword techniques. Uniform sleeves allow complete range of motion. Hands protected by fingerless gloves when needed

armor_costume.legs: Black hakama pants with reinforced knees. Leg wrappings for additional protection. Special tabi boots with split-toe design for better grip and stealth movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that changes color to black with red edge. Wooden box for carrying Nezuko during daytime. Medical supplies and demon-slaying tools. Wisteria poison for emergency use

abilities.name: Water Breathing
abilities.short_description: Sword techniques that mimic the flow and power of water
abilities.full_description: First breathing style learned, with 10 forms focusing on fluid movement and precise strikes. Creates visual effects of flowing water during attacks. Techniques range from defensive (Water Wheel) to offensive (Striking Tide). Forms can be modified and combined. Mastery allows cutting through anything with water-like persistence

abilities.name: Sun Breathing
abilities.short_description: Original breathing style from which all others derive, mimicking the sun
abilities.full_description: Most powerful breathing style with 13 forms. Creates solar flame visual effects. Can actually burn demons like sunlight. Passed down through family dance. Each form corresponds to different solar phenomena. When mastered, sword glows bright red and leaves burning trails. Can be combined with Water Breathing for unique techniques

head.eyes: Large, expressive pink eyes that change from gentle to fierce. Pupils become slitted when in combat mode. Eyes convey childlike innocence despite demon nature. Can communicate emotions through eye movements alone
head.nose: Normal human nose that retains some sensitivity. Often wrinkled when smelling danger. Bamboo muzzle covers lower face, secured by red cord
head.ears: Normal ears partially hidden by long black hair. Can hear subtle sounds even in sleep. Hair ornaments (now gone) replaced by natural hair color gradient
head.extra_facial_features: Pale demon skin that glows in moonlight. Black hair fading to orange-red at tips. Hair grows when using powers. Small fangs visible when mouth opens. Bamboo muzzle prevents biting. Childlike face that belies growing power

body.chest: Petite frame that shrinks to child size to conserve energy. Chest (32 inches) shows no definition due to child form. Demon markings appear on skin when using powers. Skin is pale but warm to touch for allies
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden strength. Biceps (9 inches) can expand with demon power. Hands have sharp black nails that can extend into claws. Wears simple kimono sleeves

lower_body.legs: Short legs in child form, normal length when grown. Thighs (16 inches) contain explosive power for kicking. Can regenerate limbs instantly. Often barefoot or wearing simple sandals

armor_costume.head: Bambose muzzle secured with red cord. No other headwear. Hair worn loose or in simple style. Former hair ornament replaced by natural color

armor_costume.torso: Pink kimono with black patterns, originally her mother's. Red obi sash. Simple undergarments. Kimono sleeves allow free movement

armor_costume.arms: No armor or protection. Kimono sleeves cover arms. Hands usually kept at sides unless fighting

armor_costume.legs: Kimono skirt allows kicking freedom. No leg armor. Often barefoot or wearing simple footwear when provided

armor_costume.equipment: Wooden box for daytime travel. No weapons besides natural demon abilities. Sometimes carries small pouch given by brother

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Exploding Blood
abilities.short_description: Manipulates own blood to create explosive or protective effects
abilities.full_description: Primary Blood Demon Art. Can ignite blood to create explosions or form protective barriers. Pink flames are harmless to humans but destructive to demons. Can create concentrated bursts or wide-area explosions. Grows more powerful with emotional triggers

abilities.name: Size Manipulation
abilities.short_description: Can shrink to child size or grow to adult form
abilities.full_description: Unique ability to conserve energy by shrinking body. Child form uses less energy and maintains human cognition. Adult form increases physical power dramatically. Transformation triggered by combat needs or emotional states

abilities.name: Daytime Resistance
abilities.short_description: Can survive sunlight exposure without disintegrating
abilities.full_description: Unique among demons. Can walk in sunlight without burning. Possibly due to human willpower or unique transformation. Sunlight still weakens but doesn't destroy. Requires more energy when in sunlight

head.eyes: Large, expressive golden-brown eyes that often tear up. Pupils shrink to dots when terrified. In sleep, eyes remain closed but senses active. Can see lightning trails even with eyes closed
head.nose: Normal nose, very sensitive to demon scents. Wrinkles when crying or scared. Can sniff out danger before seeing it
head.ears: Exceptional hearing that detects heartbeats, emotions, and minute movements. Ears twitch when detecting lies or danger. Normal appearance but function supernaturally
head.extra_facial_features: Boyish face with permanent anxious expression. Peach-colored hair with yellow gradient at tips. Hair spikes when using Thunder Breathing. Often has tear stains on cheeks. Mouth either trembling or determined line

body.chest: Slender build that hides explosive power. Chest (38 inches) expands dramatically when using breathing techniques. Wears standard uniform under yellow haori. Skin bears light scars from training
body.arms: Deceptively strong arms from constant sword practice. Biceps (13 inches) contain lightning-fast reflexes. Hands tremble when scared but steady in sleep. Calloused from gripping sword

lower_body.legs: Legs built for incredible speed. Thighs (20 inches) contain power for Thunder Breathing First Form. Calves perfectly developed for instant acceleration. Can move faster than eye can follow

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair often messy from running. Sometimes wears simple headband. Ears always exposed for maximum hearing

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer uniform. Distinctive yellow haori with white triangle pattern. Haori represents lightning. Uniform often disheveled from panic

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets. Uniform sleeves rolled up sometimes. Wears fingerless gloves for better grip

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings for support. Special tabi boots reinforced for high-speed movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that turns yellow with lightning patterns. Standard demon-slaying kit. Extra thunderclap bombs. Always carries debt collection notices

abilities.name: Thunder Breathing: First Form - Thunderclap and Flash
abilities.short_description: Extremely fast forward dash and slash
abilities.full_description: Mastered single form of Thunder Breathing. Moves at lightning speed leaving golden trail. Can be used in sixfold or eightfold variations for multiple strikes. Speed increases when unconscious. Creates actual thunderclap sound. Cuts before demon can react

abilities.name: Enhanced Hearing
abilities.short_description: Supernatural hearing ability
abilities.full_description: Can hear heartbeats, emotions, muscle movements, and even spiritual presence. Detects lies and intentions. Can pinpoint weaknesses in enemy stance. Hearing so acute it causes pain in loud environments

abilities.name: Sleep Fighting
abilities.short_description: Fights at full power while unconscious
abilities.full_description: When terrified, falls asleep and fights instinctively. Eliminates hesitation and fear. Techniques become more refined. Can access full potential without mental blocks. Wakes up unaware of actions

head.eyes: Sharp, fierce emerald green eyes visible through boar mask. Pupils contract to predatory slits when excited. Eyes glow with fighting spirit. Can see in near-darkness from mountain living
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose, nearly equal to Tanjiro's. Can track by scent alone. Often sniffs loudly when curious. Nose wrinkles when angry or confused
head.ears: Normal ears hidden by wild hair. Can hear subtle sounds from wilderness training. Ears perk up at challenge or food mention
head.extra_facial_features: Surprisingly beautiful feminine face that contrasts wild personality. Pale skin with delicate features. Blue-black hair worn wild and untamed. Often wears boar head mask. Mouth either in fierce grin or pout

body.chest: Extremely muscular and defined torso. Chest (44 inches) shows perfect muscle development. Covered in scars from mountain fights. Skin pale from lack of sun exposure. Abs clearly defined even at rest
body.arms: Massively powerful arms from wilderness survival. Biceps (16 inches) bulge with raw power. Shoulders broad and heavily muscled. Hands calloused and scarred. Can grip with crushing force

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for leaping and climbing. Thighs (24 inches) like tree trunks. Calves perfectly developed for mountain terrain. Can run on all fours at incredible speed

armor_costume.head: Boar head mask made from actual boar head. Worn constantly except when eating or sleeping. Mask has fierce expression. His own face rarely seen by others

armor_costume.torso: No shirt, exposing muscular torso. Wears fur pelt over shoulders. Later adds standard uniform pants but often leaves chest bare. Tribal markings sometimes painted on skin

armor_costume.arms: No armor. Arms completely exposed. Wrist wrappings for grip. Often has fresh scratches or wounds

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants but often torn or modified. Leg wrappings for climbing. Barefoot or simple foot coverings

armor_costume.equipment: Two notched Nichirin swords with serrated edges. Crude self-made sheaths. Often carries foraged food. Minimal demon-slaying supplies

abilities.name: Beast Breathing
abilities.short_description: Self-developed breathing style mimicking wild beasts
abilities.full_description: Unique breathing style with 10 fang techniques. Focuses on unpredictable, wild movements. Dual-wielding creates whirlwind of attacks. Can sense openings like animal sensing weakness. Techniques named after beast fangs and claws

abilities.name: Spatial Awareness
abilities.short_description: Can sense space and objects without sight
abilities.full_description: Developed in pitch-dark mountains. Can sense surroundings through air currents, vibrations, and instinct. Can fight blindfolded. Detects invisible attacks. Spatial memory is perfect

abilities.name: Flexible Joints
abilities.short_description: Can contort body in unnatural ways
abilities.full_description: Joints can dislocate and reposition at will. Can squeeze through impossibly small spaces. Attacks come from unexpected angles. Makes defense against him nearly impossible

characters.name: Giyu Tomioka
title: Water Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Former Tsuguko of Urokodaki
Tanjiro's Sponsor

head.eyes: Deep blue, perpetually serious eyes. Expression rarely changes. Eyes show focus and melancholy. Can see water flow in movements. Pupils sharpen during combat
head.nose: Straight, aristocratic nose. Normal sensitivity. Often wrinkles slightly at strong odors
head.ears: Normal ears partially covered by hair. Can hear subtle sounds. Often ignores conversational noise
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome but stern face. Black hair with uneven cut. Left side longer, right side shorter. Wears hair loose. Permanent serious expression. Rarely smiles

body.chest: Lean, athletic build. Chest (41 inches) shows perfect swordsman physique. No unnecessary bulk. Skin bears Hashira-level scars. Always maintains perfect posture
body.arms: Long, powerful arms for Water Breathing. Biceps (14.5 inches) perfectly developed. Forearms show defined muscles. Hands have sword callouses. Grip is precise and strong

lower_body.legs: Strong legs built for fluid movement. Thighs (22 inches) powerful but lean. Calves developed for quick directional changes. Always balanced perfectly

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair worn loose. Sometimes wears standard Corps headband. Forehead usually exposed

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform with haori. Two-toned haori: right side red, left side green-checkered pattern. Uniform perfectly maintained. No unnecessary accessories

armor_costume.arms: Standard uniform sleeves. No additional armor. Wears fingerless gloves sometimes

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings for support. Tabi boots for silent movement

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns deep blue. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries Corps regulations. Minimal personal items

abilities.name: Water Breathing: All Forms
abilities.short_description: Master of all Water Breathing techniques
abilities.full_description: Has mastered all 10 standard forms plus created Eleventh Form. Techniques create massive water dragon effects. Can shift between forms seamlessly. Water effects are clearer and larger than other users

abilities.name: Dead Calm (Eleventh Form)
abilities.short_description: Absolute defensive technique
abilities.full_description: Personal creation, not taught. Enters state of complete calm. Can nullify all incoming attacks within range. Creates zone of perfect defense. Requires immense concentration

abilities.name: Hashira-Level Strength
