abilities.full_description: Can transform into various objects and people (though often imperfect). Creates illusions to confuse enemies. Fox fire (small blue flames). Can multiply himself briefly. Grows more powerful with age and training

abilities.name: Seven Treasures Tool
abilities.short_description: Magic items inherited from father
abilities.full_description: Includes: Thunder Brothers' Megaphone (creates sonic attacks), Horse-Cutter (giant blade), Floaty-Tokey (flying bed), and others. Each has specific magical properties. Uses creatively in battle despite small size

head.eyes: Cold golden eyes with red pupils that show no emotion. Eyes can see life forces and spiritual flows. Gaze can paralyze weaker demons
head.nose: Highly sensitive canine nose like Inuyasha's but more refined
head.ears: No visible ears (human form). In true form, has massive dog ears. Can hear heartbeats from great distances
head.extra_facial_features: Extremely beautiful androgynous features. Long silver hair that flows like water. Magenta crescent moon on forehead. Two magenta stripes on each cheek. Pale, flawless skin. Always expressionless

body.chest: Slender, elegant build (39 inches) that belies immense power. Covered in traditional armor and flowing white fur. Skin is literally perfect - no scars or blemishes
body.arms: Sleek arms with deadly claws. Left arm regrows after being severed. Wears armor pauldrons. Hands are elegant but deadly

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Magenta crescent moon marking on forehead. White fur collar frames face like a mane

armor_costume.torso: Traditional white and purple kimono with massive white fur collar/shawl. Armor plates on shoulders and chest. Flowing sash that moves like living thing

armor_costume.arms: Armored sleeves with purple patterns. Claws are always exposed. Wears Tenseiga at hip

armor_costume.legs: White hakama pants. Armored boots that allow silent movement. Flowing sash continues down legs

armor_costume.accessories: Tenseiga (sword of life). Tokijin (sword of death, later). Poison whip (light energy). Magical beads and regalia of his station

abilities.name: Tenseiga's Power
abilities.short_description: Sword that can revive the dead but cannot kill
abilities.full_description: Can revive recently dead by cutting hell beings. Creates protective barriers. Can purify poison and corruption. Later gains Meido Zangetsuha ability (like Tetsusaiga). Only works for those with compassion, which Sesshomaru develops

abilities.name: Full Demon Transformation
abilities.short_description: Massive dog demon form of immense power
abilities.full_description: True form is giant white dog with purple markings. Can fly and create tornados with tail. Breathes demonic energy attacks. Nearly invulnerable in this form. Only transforms for most serious threats

characters.name: Kikyo
title: Former Guardian of the Jewel
Most Powerful Miko of Her Era
Resurrected Warrior

head.eyes: Dark, soulful eyes that hold centuries of wisdom and sorrow. Eyes can see spiritual impurities and life forces
head.nose: Delicate nose. Can smell death and spiritual corruption
head.ears: Normal ears, often hidden by hair. Wears no earrings
head.extra_facial_features: Pale, beautiful face that shows little emotion. Long black hair with straight bangs. Traditional miko appearance. Clay body gives unnatural pallor. Soul collectors sometimes visible around her

body.chest: Slender build (35 inches) of a priestess. Appears fragile but contains immense power. Clay body animated by stolen souls
body.arms: Slender arms that draw bow with supernatural strength. Hands are pale and cool to touch

armor_costume.head: No headwear. Sometimes wears traveling hood or cloak

armor_costume.torso: Traditional red and white miko robes. Sometimes wears purple kimono when traveling. Carries bow and arrows always

armor_costume.arms: No armor. Kimono sleeves. Sometimes wears arm guards for archery

armor_costume.legs: Traditional hakama pants under robes. Zori sandals. Moves silently despite clothing

armor_costume.accessories: Sacred bow and arrows. Soul collection clay dolls. Healing herbs and medicines. Spiritual purification tools

abilities.name: Purification Arrows
abilities.short_description: Arrows of pure spiritual energy stronger than Kagome's
abilities.full_description: Can purify demons with single arrow. Arrows seek evil. Can create barriers that repel all impurity. Spiritual pressure can paralyze weaker demons. Knowledge of ancient sealing techniques. Power comes from complete spiritual purity

abilities.name: Soul Manipulation
abilities.short_description: Controls souls due to her undead nature
abilities.full_description: Can collect souls of recently dead to sustain her clay body. Can transfer souls between bodies. Sense disturbances in soul flows. Understands reincarnation cycle intimately. As undead, has unique perspective on life and death

head.eyes: Cold, calculating eyes that see all as pawns. Usually appears as handsome man with dark hair, but true form is monstrous
head.nose: Normal human nose in human form. Can smell emotions and weaknesses
head.ears: Normal ears in human form. Multiple sensory organs in true form
head.extra_facial_features: Appears as handsome nobleman with pale skin and dark hair. True form is mass of demons fused together. Often wears elegant kimono to hide monstrous nature. Smile never reaches eyes

body.chest: Human form: slender nobleman build. True form: amorphous mass of demons. Contains hundreds of absorbed demons within. Regenerates from almost any damage
body.arms: Human form: normal arms. Can extend limbs or transform them into weapons. Creates puppet bodies from his flesh

armor_costume.head: Sometimes wears nobleman's hat or hood. Jewel shard glows on forehead in true form

armor_costume.torso: Elegant purple and black kimono of nobleman. Underneath is mass of demon flesh. Carries Shikon Jewel (incomplete)

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves hide demonic transformations. Can shed skin to create clones

armor_costume.legs: Traditional hakama. Can dissolve into miasma or swarm of insects

armor_costume.accessories: Shikon Jewel fragments. Demon puppets and minions. Illusion-creating items. Poison manufacturing tools

abilities.name: Miasma and Poison
abilities.short_description: Deadly demonic poison that corrodes everything
abilities.full_description: Produces toxic miasma that kills humans and weakens demons. Can control its density and composition. Creates poisonous insects and clones. Immune to most toxins. Can analyze and copy any poison encountered

abilities.name: Demon Absorption and Creation
abilities.short_description: Absorbs demons to gain their powers and create puppets
abilities.full_description: Can absorb any demon to gain its abilities. Creates puppet demons from his flesh (Kagura, Kanna, etc.). Can split into multiple bodies. Each分身 has specialized powers. True body hides while puppets act

characters.name: Koga
title: Leader of the Eastern Wolf Tribe
Bearer of Shikon Jewel Shards
Inuyasha's Rival

head.eyes: Vibrant blue eyes that show fierce loyalty and pride. Eyesight enhanced for tracking at high speeds
head.nose: Wolf nose even more sensitive than dog demons. Can track over hundreds of miles
head.ears: Wolf ears on top of head, gray like his hair. Can hear prey heartbeat while running
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome, wild features with gray hair styled in mohawk. Three red stripes on each cheek. Sharp fangs. Wears wolf pelt and tribal markings. Confident, cocky smile

body.chest: Powerful, athletic build (42 inches) built for running. Covered in tribal tattoos and wolf pelts. Multiple Shikon jewel shards embedded in legs
body.arms: Strong arms (15 inches) for grappling and weapon use. Clawed fingers. Tribal armbands

armor_costume.head: Wolf pelt headband. Sometimes wears full wolf head as helmet

armor_costume.torso: Wolf pelt across shoulders. Leather chest armor with tribal designs. Exposed midriff showing muscles. Shikon jewel shards visible in legs

armor_costume.arms: Leather arm guards. Clawed fingers exposed. Wrist bands with wolf teeth

armor_costume.legs: Loosely fitting pants for running. Shikon shards embedded in both legs. Barefoot or light footwraps

armor_costume.accessories: Tribal necklace with fangs. Sometimes carries simple weapons. Travels with wolf pack

abilities.name: Super Speed
abilities.short_description: Extreme running speed powered by Shikon jewel shards
abilities.full_description: Shikon shards in legs grant speed faster than eyes can follow. Can run on air by kicking so fast. Creates afterimages and tornadoes. Enhanced reflexes to match speed. Can carry others while running

abilities.name: Wolf Pack Techniques
abilities.short_description: Commands wolf pack and uses wind attacks
abilities.full_description: Commands loyal wolf demons in battle. Can summon pack from distance. Wind-based claw attacks (Goraishi). Enhanced senses from wolf nature. Pack hunting tactics and coordination

characters.name: Rin
title: Human Companion of a Great Demon
Twice-Born Child
Jaken's Charge

head.eyes: Large, innocent brown eyes that see good in everyone. Eyes hold wisdom beyond her years
head.nose: Small, normal human nose
head.ears: Normal ears, sometimes hidden by hair
head.extra_facial_features: Sweet, round face of a young girl. Always smiling despite tragic past. Black hair in simple cut. Wears simple peasant clothes. Scars from past abuse mostly healed

body.chest: Small child's body (age 8-10). Not built for combat but for compassion
body.arms: Small arms that gather flowers and help others. Hands are gentle

armor_costume.head: No headwear. Sometimes wears flower crown or simple ribbon

armor_costume.torso: Simple red kimono given by Sesshomaru. Sometimes wears additional layers in cold. Carries small satchel

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor or protection

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants under kimono. Straw sandals

armor_costume.accessories: Flowers and herbs she collects. Small doll or toy. Sometimes carries food for animals

abilities.name: Innocence and Compassion
abilities.short_description: Pure heart that affects even the coldest demon
abilities.full_description: Her unconditional kindness softens Sesshomaru's heart. Can approach dangerous animals without fear. Understands emotions of non-humans. Brings out protective instincts in others. Represents humanity's best qualities

abilities.name: Survival Skills
abilities.short_description: Knowledge of living in wilderness and demon world
abilities.full_description: Can identify edible plants and berries. Basic first aid knowledge. Understands demon behaviors and customs. Travels safely through dangerous lands with Sesshomaru's protection. Adapts to life among demons

characters.name: Jaken
title: Loyal Servant of the Western Lands
Rin's Guardian
Messenger Demon

head.eyes: Beady yellow eyes that show anxiety, loyalty, and occasional cunning
head.nose: Long, pointed nose. Good sense of smell for servant duties
head.ears: Large, pointed imp ears. Can hear Sesshomaru's commands from distance
head.extra_facial_features: Green imp-like face with warts. Bald head. Often looks nervous or officious. Wears simple servant garments

body.chest: Small, frail imp body. Not built for combat but for service
body.arms: Thin arms that wield staff. Hands are delicate but dexterous

armor_costume.head: Sometimes wears small hat or hood. Usually bareheaded

armor_costume.torso: Simple brown and green servant robes. Carries Sesshomaru's items and messages

armor_costume.arms: Robes sleeves. No armor

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. Small sandals

armor_costume.accessories: Staff of Two Heads (can shoot fire). Scrolls and messages. Supplies for Rin. Sometimes rides two-headed dragon Ah-Un

abilities.name: Staff of Two Heads
abilities.short_description: Magic staff that shoots fire and has limited sentience
abilities.full_description: Heads argue with each other but obey Jaken. Shoots fireballs of varying intensity. Can extend or change size. Occasionally disobeys or acts independently. Gift from Sesshomaru

abilities.name: Servant Skills
abilities.short_description: Knowledge of demon nobility and service
abilities.full_description: Understands protocols of demon lords. Can deliver messages across Japan. Basic care-taking of Rin. Knowledge of demon politics and territories. Survival skills while traveling with Sesshomaru

head.eyes: Red eyes that show defiance and longing for freedom. Eyeshadow adds dramatic effect
head.nose: Normal nose. Can smell approaching enemies with wind
head.ears: Normal ears, often hidden by hair
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful but cold features. White hair with red tips. Uses feather as hair ornament. Wears red and white kimono. Often looks distant or plotting

body.chest: Slender feminine build (35 inches). Light and agile like the wind
body.arms: Graceful arms that control wind and fan. Hands often hold her fan feather

armume_costume.head: White hair with red tips. Feather hair ornament. Sometimes wears traveling hat

armume_costume.torso: Red and white kimono with feather patterns. Light armor underneath. Carries fan always

armume_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves allow full movement. No heavy armor

armume_costume.legs: Traditional hakama. Light boots for quick movement

armume_costume.accessories: Feather fan (controls wind). Sometimes carries sword. Demon horse for travel

abilities.name: Wind Control
abilities.short_description: Manipulates wind with feather fan
abilities.full_description: Creates razor-sharp wind blades. Can fly on wind currents. Creates tornadoes and hurricanes. Uses wind for defense and propulsion. Most powerful wind user in series

abilities.name: Puppet Body Knowledge
abilities.short_description: Understanding of Naraku's creations and weaknesses
abilities.full_description: Knows how Naraku creates puppets. Understands weaknesses of other puppets (Kanna, etc.). Can resist some of Naraku's control. Knowledge of Naraku's hiding places and methods

head.eyes: Young, troubled eyes that have seen too much. Often blank when memory-less
head.nose: Normal nose, similar to Sango's
head.ears: Normal ears
head.extra_facial_features: Youthful face of a boy (12-14). Looks like younger male version of Sango. Short dark hair. Often looks confused or determined. Shikon shard visible on back of neck

body.chest: Boy's developing build. Wears light demon slayer armor
body.arms: Young but trained arms. Wields chain sickle weapon skillfully

armor_costume.head: Sometimes wears demon slayer mask. Usually bareheaded

armor_costume.torso: Simplified demon slayer armor in blue and white. Lighter than Sango's for his size
armor_costume.arms: Light arm guards. Allows full mobility for his weapon

armor_costume.legs: Light pants and boots. Built for agility over strength

armor_costume.accessories: Chain sickle weapon. Basic demon slayer tools. Medicine for memory loss

abilities.name: Chain Sickle Mastery
abilities.short_description: Wields unique chain weapon with precision
abilities.full_description: Weapon extends and retracts with chained sections. Can entangle enemies or strike from distance. Uses with demon slayer techniques. Trained since childhood. Adapts weapon to compensate for smaller size

abilities.name: Memory Fragmentation
abilities.short_description: Lives with controlled memories and conditioning
abilities.full_description: Memories controlled by Naraku via shard. Can be turned into puppet assassin. Gradually regains true memories. Develops resistance to control. Represents trauma and recovery

head.eyes: One wise eye (lost other protecting village). Eye sees spiritual truths and practical realities
head.nose: Normal aged nose. Can smell illness and spiritual corruption
head.ears: Normal ears, often hidden by hair
head.extra_facial_features: Elderly woman with kind, wrinkled face. White hair. Missing right eye (covered by patch). Wears simple miko robes. Always calm and knowing

body.chest: Elderly woman's build. Not physically strong but spiritually powerful
body.arms: Aged arms that still can perform rituals and healing

armor_costume.head: Eye patch over right eye. Sometimes wears simple scarf

armor_costume.torso: Traditional miko robes in red and white. Simpler than Kikyo's. Practical for village life

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor

armor_costume.legs: Traditional hakama. Simple sandals

armor_costume.accessories: Healing herbs and medicines. Spiritual tools. Village records and scrolls. Pipe for smoking

abilities.name: Elder's Wisdom
abilities.short_description: Decades of experience with demons and village life
abilities.full_description: Knowledge of demon lore and history. Understands human nature and village dynamics. Medicinal and herbal knowledge. Spiritual guidance and counseling. Bridge between feudal and modern (via Kagome)

abilities.name: Spiritual Guidance
abilities.short_description: Limited spiritual powers for protection and healing
abilities.full_description: Can create basic purification barriers. Performs blessings and ceremonies. Basic healing of spiritual wounds. Can sense evil presences. Teaches Kagome about her powers

characters.name: Bankotsu
alias: Leader of the Band of Seven
title: Strongest of the Band of Seven
Bearer of the Shikon Jewel
Master of the Banryu

head.eyes: Sharp, battle-hungry eyes that enjoy combat. Eyes show both brutality and odd honor code
head.nose: Normal nose, scarred from battles
head.ears: Normal ears. Wears earrings with skull motifs
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome but brutal face. White hair in distinctive style. Cross-shaped scar on forehead. Often grinning with bloodlust. Wears mercenary armor and furs

body.chest: Massive, powerful build (46 inches) of seasoned warrior. Covered in scars and tattoos. Wears heavy armor pieces
body.arms: Enormously strong arms (17 inches) from wielding giant sword. Covered in battle scars

armor_costume.head: No helmet. White hair styled up. Cross forehead scar visible

armor_costume.torso: Heavy fur and leather armor. Exposes chest to show fearlessness. Carries Banryu on shoulder

armor_costume.arms: Heavy arm guards. No gloves to better grip weapon

armor_costume.legs: Heavy pants and boots. Practical for all terrains

armor_costume.accessories: Banryu (giant double-bladed sword). Shikon jewel shards (when obtained). Skull motif jewelry. Traveling supplies

abilities.name: Banryu Mastery
abilities.short_description: Wields massive double-bladed sword with superhuman strength
abilities.full_description: Banryu can extend into segments for whip-like attacks. Can channel demonic energy when combined with Shikon Jewel. Creates shockwaves with swings. Trained to use weight as advantage. Can fight multiple opponents simultaneously

abilities.name: Undead Resilience
abilities.short_description: Resurrected body with enhanced abilities
abilities.full_description: Brought back by Naraku with clay bodies and Shikon shards. Doesn't feel pain or fatigue. Can reattach severed limbs. Enhanced strength beyond human limits. Only dies if shard is destroyed

head.eyes: Three eyes (third on forehead). Eyes show ancient wisdom and craft knowledge
head.nose: Bull-like nose. Can smell metal purity and demon energies
head.ears: Ox ears. Can hear the 'voice' of swords
head.extra_facial_features: Old ox demon face with white beard. Third eye on forehead. Wears simple craftsman clothes. Always looks busy or thoughtful

body.chest: Old but strong ox demon body. Years of smithing built durable frame
body.arms: Powerful arms from centuries of hammering. Hands are calloused but precise

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Third eye visible. Sometimes wears eye protection when smithing

armor_costume.torso: Simple craftsman apron over robes. Covered in soot and burn marks

armor_costume.arms: Leather arm guards for smithing. No fancy armor

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. Sturdy boots for forge work

armor_costume.accessories: Smithing hammer and tools. Blueprints and scrolls. Travels on three-eyed cow. Samples of special metals

abilities.name: Legendary Sword Smithing
abilities.short_description: Knowledge of creating and repairing demon swords
abilities.full_description: Created Tetsusaiga and Tenseiga from Great Dog Demon's fang. Understands all demon sword properties. Can repair even magical blades. Knows history and secrets of every major sword. Teaching ability to pass on craft

abilities.name: Ancient Demon Lore
abilities.short_description: Millennia of knowledge about demons and their weapons
abilities.full_description: Knew Inuyasha and Sesshomaru's father personally. Understands demon politics and history. Knows weaknesses and strengths of all demon types. Repository of lost knowledge. Advisor to powerful demons
